CREATE PROCEDURE [bcs_mpp_SetNvarcharMaxForMPPBcsFoot] (@tableName varchar(32)) AS BEGIN DECLARE @SQLString nvarchar(500) DECLARE @suffix nvarchar(4)
DECLARE languageSuffixCursor CURSOR LOCAL FOR SELECT SUFFIX FROM innovator.[LANGUAGE]
IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sys.tables t JOIN sys.columns c on t.object_id = c.object_id WHERE t.name = @tableName AND c.name LIKE 'bcs_foot%' AND c.max_length <> -1 ) RETURN;
OPEN languageSuffixCursor FETCH NEXT FROM languageSuffixCursor INTO @suffix
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN SET @SQLString = 'ALTER TABLE innovator.' + @tableName + ' ALTER COLUMN bcs_foot' + COALESCE(@suffix, '') + ' nvarchar(max)' EXECUTE sp_executesql @SQLString
FETCH NEXT FROM languageSuffixCursor INTO @suffix END
CLOSE languageSuffixCursor DEALLOCATE languageSuffixCursor END
